Generation IX.Scarlet: Frigibax absorbs heat through its dorsal fin and converts the heat into ice energy. The higher the temperature, the more energy Frigibax stores.
Generation IX.Violet: This Pokémon lives in forests and craggy areas. Using the power of its dorsal fin, it cools the inside of its nest like a refrigerator.

Generation IX.Scarlet: North Province: Dalizapa Passage , Glaseado Mountain North Province: Glaseado Mountain ( Dark Tera Type ) Tera Raid Battles ( 3★ )
Generation IX.Violet: North Province: Dalizapa Passage , Glaseado Mountain North Province: Glaseado Mountain ( Dark Tera Type ) Tera Raid Battles ( 3★ )
